name: Responsive Lightbox
tagline: Lightweight, image only responsive, jQuery lightbox
body:
I am pleased to present my image-only, responsive, super lightweight, jQuery lightbox plugin. I was recently tasked with finding a lightbox plugin for high traffic ecommerce site I was building from scratch. Given the impact page weight can have on conversion, bounce rates and a bunch of other delicate analytic metrics, it was essential every piece of JavaScript selected for the site was as lightweight as possible, along with being responsive. Most lightboxes that met the responsive requirement came bundled with functionality to display videos, and transitioned from slide to slide in more elaborate ways than the next. I just wanted to popup an image so I built my own. Over time I've added a few options to keep make it a bit reusable but still it remains less than 1KB minified and GZipped. ### Demo ### Usage Firstly drop in jQuery 1.4 or above. ```html
Image 1 Image 2
``` ### Options * margin - int - default 50. Minimum margin around the image * nav - bool - default true. enable navigation * blur - bool - default true. Blur other content when open using css filter * minSize - int - default 0. Min window width or height to open lightbox. Below threshold will open image in a new tab. ```javascript $('.gallery').lightbox({ margin: 20, nav: false, blur: true, minSize: 480 }); ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
